tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Full Engagement
programme.desc: While on their day off, Harm takes Mac for a flight in his vintage airplane, only to be forced to make an emergency landing in a mountain clearing because of mechanical problems.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Cowboys and Cossaks
programme.desc: Harm, Mac, and Bud are assigned sea duty to monitor a joint war games exercise between U.S. and Russian naval forces.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Guardian
programme.desc: Harm and Mac defend Bauwer, a former Navy Seal, now a homeless man, who's accused of using excessive force when he killed three men who tried to hold up a convenience store.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Mother Load
programme.desc: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Ice Ca-Cabes
programme.desc: When a mission in the desert results in exploding shrapnel that seriously wounds Cabe, Team Scorpion must freeze his body in order to save his life.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Faux Money Maux Problems
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Hole Truth
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must save a man teetering on the edge of a massive sink hole that threatens to destroy the Los Angeles water supply forever.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Yvette takes Karl, Stuart and Mary into the vast Shrewsbury Prison. A place riddled with paranormal activity of every kind.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette & Mary enter the vast expanse of the very haunted A-Wing on their own and soon start to regret their decision.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Yvette and Mary investigating A-Wing, Karl & Stuart take on the formidable C-Wing where the unhappy spirits of past residents are said to roam.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: York Castle Museum
programme.desc: The history of York Castle Museum is almost endless as are the paranormal stories attached to it. Karl enters the street and cells with dramatic effect.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all\nbut forgotten piece of British history.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Don't Feed the Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS revisits a familiar city, Alexandria, Louisiana, but this time, they're there to investigate the Alexandria Zoo.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pioneers
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Gloucester, Massachusetts to investigate Hammond Castle.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 6
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hollywood Horror Stories
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hollywood, California to investigate the infamous Black Dahlia murder at the historic Sowden House.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Curtain Call
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Joliet, Illinois to investigate the Rialto Square Theater, which is becoming known for being more than just an entertainment venue.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.sub-title: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Tunnel at the End of the Light
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.205
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old ex-roommates quarrel over a cat fight, the cost to replace a mattress, and vet bills.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her niece for a series of loans she says she made to pay for living expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.223
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-boyfriend of charging over $10,000 on her emergency credit card while she studied abroad in Germany. A man admits to stabbing an air mattress due to spilled beer, leading to a lawsuit by his girlfriend's ex-boyfriend for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.204
programme.desc: A man sues his ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan he says he made for bail; he is countersued for alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers, who accuse each other of infidelity, fight over $3,000 in credit card bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.165
programme.desc: Man sues ex over alleged false restraining order; denies gun threat. Mother with concerns about son's spending keeps his money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.52
programme.desc: A woman sues her daughter’s schoolmate and her teen goddaughter for damages to her property and an ambulance bill, resulting from an assault.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.73
programme.desc: Teenager denies side-swiping mailbox, sues friend for car damage. Woman's arm broken during playful punch exchange with friend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.114
programme.desc: Man faces assault charges after altercation with son/Ex-fiancé sued for rent and unpaid loans.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.170
programme.desc: $6,000 spent on a dog’s pacemaker and rattlesnake-bite medical bills are contested by a Good Samaritan animal rescuer who hated to see “Ginger” eventually put down.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.217
programme.desc: A woman's Disneyland trip after a concussion weakens her lost wages claim. Another woman discovers her fiancé's hidden child while he's incarcerated, leading to property disputes.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.80
programme.desc: Teenager left with mess and suspected vandalism by ex-roommate, involving seven-layer dip under mattress and thermostat set to 90 degrees. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for unpaid rent and share of vacation; he countersues, alleging she damaged door and wall.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.33
programme.desc: Slashed tires, alleged slander on the internet, and a fight over children’s Christmas gifts come into play when ex-lovers end a rocky relationship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.62
programme.desc: Man allegedly smashes ex-girlfriend's stereo in jealous rage; she accused of throwing his leather jacket in rain. Fight continues over parking fines. House sitter accused of trashing friend's apartment, damaging car while out of town.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay prepares dishes for the contestants to taste and re-create; a proposal is planned during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final three chefs must prepare a meal for 100 people, including chefs from Los Angeles' finest restaurants.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two finalists must work with an architect to design restaurant spaces for their final dinner service competition.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two remaining contestants compete in the final dinner service; the winner of the head chef job in Atlantic City is chosen.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 16 chefs are sent to the kitchen to create their signature dishes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Island Hopper
programme.desc: When a brother bondsman from Washington State calls Dog for help tracking a runner in search of fun in the sun on the tropical paradise of Kauai, the team gets on the case. Dog's only problem? No leads!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Nice Guys Finish Last
programme.desc: Dog and team help out a bondsman friend whose client jumped bail, but the target is a blank slate. Are his tattoos gang related? Is he likely to be violent? And making matters worse, when they hit his apartment they learn he is moving out.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars
programme.desc: While tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland struggles to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Man
programme.desc: Dog and family head to Kona to track down a wanted father who's looking to bolt to the mainland to evade sentencing. Meanwhile, Dog does some evading of his own - Avoiding the much dreaded birthday party!(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.(n)

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: When aliens have infiltrated society by inhabiting bodies of select human beings, they plan a full-scale invasion of Earth. A detective finds the information that can stop the attack; however the information is in the mind of a six-year-old child.(n)

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar® nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13.(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.(n)

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn’t about to let a witness be murdered on his watch.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Crystal Skulls
programme.desc: It is 2020 and the apocalypse is inevitable. 12 of 13 Crystal skulls are united causing catastrophic events. Only the 13th Skull can theoretically restore order before the Earth is destroyed from within by their power.(n)

programme.title: This is Our Christmas
programme.desc: When a spoiled Beverly Hills teenager needs to be taught a lesson she is sent to the local ski-town, by her guardian angel mother to help save her aunt's failing bakery and learn the importance of helping others.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter and burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past decides to go AWOL.(n)

programme.title: Sound Of Christmas
programme.desc: Whilst trying to reignite his daughter’s passion for Christmas, Brad, falls in love with piano teacher, Lizzie. However, their romance is threatened by Brad’s business interests.(n)

programme.title: Hatchet Hour
programme.desc: An ambitious lawyer kills her gardener by mistake, fearing her chances with the law and the impact this will have on her career at a prestigious firm, she turns to her best friend to help her get rid of the body.(n)

programme.title: Living in Fear
programme.desc: A newly married bride travels to her husband's hometown for the reading of his father's will. When she discovers that the townspeople suspect her husband of a murder committed twenty years ago, she has her doubts about the man she's committed her life to.(n)

programme.title: Killer Infatuation
programme.desc: Mackenzie runs a killer-dedicated podcast with a large fan base. However, she begins living her own murder mystery, as she develops an infatuation with her impossibly attractive new neighbor, who was the prime suspect in a murder years ago.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Catherine Bell) tracks a kidnapper while developing a rapport with his latest victim.(n)

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: Movie producer Thomas Ince (Cary Elwes) dies after yachting with William Randolph Hearst (Edward Herrmann), Charlie Chaplin and Marion Davies (Kirsten Dunst).(n)

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A college student suspects her new stepfather may be having an affair. Her suspicions seem to be confirmed when she sees him with another woman; a woman who is later found dead. She begins to wonder exactly who her mother married.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When an outlaw leader lures Marshall Torrance out of town, Only Lucas can stop him from lynching a local man who killed one of the members of his gang.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A former army captain comes to North Fork to kill the man who shot down his son in a gunfight - Lucas McCain.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his friend become trapped in an old mine.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark try to persuade a persecuted young mute to return stolen money.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A doctor seeks revenge on the man he blames for ruining his practice.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas unmasks a killer posing as a door-to-door seed salesman.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deathbed request from an old friend sends Lucas to a neighboring town in search of the man's long-lost sweetheart.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a young man, eerily similar to a man he killed in the Civil War, challenges him to a gunfight.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Must Wait
programme.desc: An American inherits an old village church in England, where treasure is buried. Greedy Mr. Slee scents his opportunity to snatch the treasure. Diggity, a little cherub trying to earn his wings, helps uncover the treasure for the benefit of the village.(n)

programme.title: Mark & Russell's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Mark is excited when the most popular girl in his class asks HIM to drive her to a party, except he doesn't have a license. With his popularity on the line and his best friend Russell in tow, Mark hits the road on a cross-town adventure.(n)

programme.title: Not to Forget
programme.desc: After a life of little scams, a self-centered millennial is sentenced to take care of his grandmother, who is affected by Alzheimer's. As he realizes the extent of her wealth, the protagonist gets closer to the treasure he's been looking for.(n)

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.(n)

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A history of inherited insanity spells trouble for a 19th-century nobleman suspected of a series of grisly murders.(n)

programme.title: Straight on Till Morning
programme.desc: A timid, withdrawn woman from Liverpool moves to London and finally meets a man who she believes to be the love of her life, but unbeknownst to her, that man is a vicious serial killer.(n)

programme.title: Find The Lady
programme.desc: During New Year's Eve, a young model spends the day searching for her grandmother, who has suspiciously gone missing.(n)

programme.title: Circus of Fear
programme.desc: Scotland Yard detectives find intrigue and murder at a new circus attraction.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: The Right Hand of God - October 24, 1974
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) lands in 1974 as a young boxer caught between fight-fixing gangsters and hopeful nuns who now own his contract. With Dean Stockwell. Guest stars Guy Stockwell and Teri Copley.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: When Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes an attractive female secretary in 1961, he must deal with rampant sexism and his employer's lecherous advances. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: How the Tess Was Won - September 28, 1956
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) finds himself on a Texas ranch in 1956 as a submissive veterinarian in love with a tough rancher (Kari Lizer). With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a hit man in 1965 whose romance with the godfather's (Michael Genovese) girlfriend (Terri Garber) places him in danger. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) experiences racism firsthand when he leaps into the body of an elderly black man in the pre-civil rights South of 1955. Guest star: Susan French. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Palace of Terror
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: Flaming Death
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Buddha's Bowl
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Nepal to recover Buddha's fabled overflowing alms bowl for villagers who are building a shrine to the original Buddha.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Headless Nun
programme.desc: When Sydney's plane crashes, she's asked by a group of nuns to find the head of another nun who was decapitated several centuries ago.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Smoking Gun
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel search for Al Capone's diamond-encrusted gun at the behest of a man hoping it will clear his grandfather of a murder he was framed for.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Affaire de Coeur
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Scotland to find the second ring of the pair of Twining Rings of Calum and Elena.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)
